title: Ant Colony Logic
subtitle: Distributed intelligence and the art of pathfinding.
description: Exploring how distributed intelligence helps us solve complex logistics problems.

content.biological_inspiration: Ants leave pheromone trails to mark the shortest path to food, creating a self-optimizing network.
content.technical_equivalent: Ant Colony Optimization (ACO) algorithms used in GPS routing, network packet switching, and delivery logistics.
content.coding_logic: Probabilistic path selection and pheromone evaporation rates in software simulation.
